statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // "0"'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); dir=$(basename "$(pwd)"); if (( $(echo "$used >= 80" | bc -l 2>/dev/null || echo 0) )); then cc="\033[31m"; elif (( $(echo "$used >= 50" | bc -l 2>/dev/null || echo 0) )); then cc="\033[33m"; else cc="\033[32m"; fi; printf "\033[36m%s@%s\033[0m | \033[34m%s\033[0m | \033[35m%s\033[0m | ${cc}Context: %s%%%% used\033[0m" "$user" "$host" "$dir" "$model" "$used"
